item.title: My drive has been blocked, 13th September
item.description:
Yesterday someone blocked my driveway with no notice. If I need to get out in an emergency I can’t. This is brain numbingly, stupid, irresponsible, dangerous and illegal. These obstructions need to be moved immediately. By the way, the movements to the pavement and the neighbours need a permanent fix to save the council coming back every few weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Summer Hill, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked across drive so can’t access my driveway, 13th September
item.description:
Car has blocked access to my driveway and is parked on a white line and blocking a dropped curb. I have a child and am not easily able to unload from the car. It has been there overnight and still has not moved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurstbourne Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Piles of broken glass right in front of the door, 13th September
item.description:
Every single day the pub garden is open in the morning there’s piles of broken glass in this street, right in front of the door. For two months without fail, people and dogs and have been hurting themselves from accidentally stepping on it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cottons Gardens, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
